page.title: 12POLLUTION
page.content: The cause of pollution is raw sewage and oil,but there are other causes as well such as: poisons,rubbish,fumes,factories or silage effluent.All these will reduce oxygen so fish will die.Detergent will also kill the plants.The means of testing are as follows.One man will stand in front with a 240volt pulse stunner.Anot stands behind with a net to catch them behind that another person has a bucket to carry the stunned fish.So three people are in the river. Also another is on the bank measuring the fish and taking scales off the fish to see how old they are.They measure the length of the fish to see if there is enough food for them to eat.The fish will die in polluted water.Water nymphs are counted in a sample of river water as they need lots of oxyge
